com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.domainrep.rdm.directory

Interface DirectoryRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DirectoryMsg, MsgBase

    public interface DirectoryRequest
extends DirectoryMsg
    A Directory request message is encoded and sent by OMM consumer applications. A consumer can request information about all services by omitting serviceId information, or specify a serviceId to request information about only that service.
    See Also:
    DirectoryMsg
